Public sector trade union formed in S. Korea
       Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- A trade union of public service  workers was formed in Changwon region of South Kyongsang Province, according to a radio report  from Seoul. 
  In case this legal trade union  spreads to all regions of South Korea, it will become an industrial trade union with over 700,000 members.
